altTitles.ja: フールナイト

description.en:
In the distant future, earth is covered by thick clouds and deprived of the warm rays of sunlight. Natural plants have all but withered, leading to low levels of oxygen everywhere. 

However, humans have developed a technique to transform people into plants to produce a small amount of oxygen that allows mankind to keep surviving. In this world, everyone must decide: Will they live as humans in a bleak and uncertain world, or abandon their anguish to embrace a new life as plants?
___
[Alt Official English (Shougakukan Asia)](https://shogakukan.asia/fool-night/)
description.ru:
Продолжать прикладывать усилия ради жизни человеком? Или же красиво осыпаться, подобно цветку? Душевно изображенный неизвестный мир будущего!

Мир далёкого будущего окружают облака, не пропускающие дневной свет, увядших растений и недостатка кислорода. Однако, люди разработали технологию превращения человека в растение для получения кислорода и продолжают выживать.
Перед людьми встаёт нелёгкий выбор - продолжать выживать в этом безнадежном мире людей или же, отбросив страдания, сделать шаг в новую жизнь в виде растений?

title.en: Otaku ni Otoku na Gal Gurashi

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Otoku na Gal Gurashi

altTitles.ja: オタクにオトクなギャルぐらし

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Otoku na Gyaru Gurashi

altTitles.en: An Otaku and an Otaku Gyaru's Life Together
Otaku and Gyaru Living Together With Benefits
A Gal’s Guide To Budget Living for an Otaku

description.en: Yutaka Kongouji is the son of a wealthy family, but also an introvert and an otaku. He lives only to spend all his allowance supporting his favorite idol. But when his parents' business fails, he has to move into a run-down apartment on his own. There he ran into Rino Hyuga, a popular gal in his class...

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女部まどか☆マギカ

description.en: A story where, in a world where magical girls and witches peacefully co-exist, Madoka decides to start a magical girl club.

altTitles.en: Finding Avalon: The Quest of a Chaosbringer

altTitles.ja: 災悪のアヴァロン
災悪のアヴァロン～ゲーム最弱の悪役デブに転移したけど、俺だけ“やせれば強くてニューゲーム”な世界だったので、最速レベルアップ＆破滅フラグ回避で影の英雄を目指します～

description.en:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dan-Ex. During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server.
Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la sirvienta del protagonista de un juego de terror

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w

altTitles.ja: FPSで初心者ボコってリアルファイトに発展した結果w

altTitles.en: After Beating a Noob in an FPS, He Wanted to Fight Me in Real Life LOL

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Bị Tôi Bón Hành Trong Game, Có Đứa Hẹn Kèo Đánh Tôi!

altTitles.id: Hasil dari Mengalahkan seorang Pemula di FPS yang Berkembang Menjadi Pertarungan di RL haha

altTitles.ro: Luptând Cu Un Începător La Jocurile FPS

altTitles.es-la: Después de vencer a un novato en un FPS, ¡Quería pelear conmigo en la vida real jaja!

description.en:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
description.ja:
FPSで初心者をボコったらリアルファイトに誘われた！？
面白半分で行ってみるとそこにいたのは可愛い女の子！
クズ系主人公と、闘志マンマンのヒロインによる
ラブコメディ！？
未公開の前日章「とある1日」も追加しています！

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: Otaku ni Yasashii Gal wa Inai!?

altTitles.ja: オタクに優しいギャルはいない!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru wa Inai!?
Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru ha Inai!?

altTitles.en: Gal can’t be Kind to Otaku!?
Gals can't be Kind to a Geek!?

altTitles.zh: 没有辣妹会对阿宅温柔!?

altTitles.pt-br: Gal Não Pode ser Legal com Otaku!?

altTitles.vi: Gyaru không thể tử tế với Otaku ư?

description.en: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

altTitles.ja: ガールズゾンビパーティー

description.en: An extreme survival story of girls in a world where half of humanity has turned into monstrous beings!  That day, Sayo Mitsurugi wasn’t focused on her lessons, due to staying up late the previous night.  During the lunch break, she was talking on the phone with her hospitalized younger brother, and up until that moment, everything was part of her usual routine.  But then. Suddenly, the signal cut off, and the phone call ended. From that moment on, hell began!  Due to the influence of zombies that appeared in the school, the men began to transform into monstrous beings one after another.  By chance, Saya teams up with her classmates, the angelic Maria and Momo, to attempt an escape from this hell!
description.ja:
御剣サヤはその日、夜更かしの影響もあって、授業に身が入っていなかった。昼休み、入院中の弟と電話するなど、その時はまでは、変わらない日常だった。

だが。突然電波が途絶えて、電話が切れた。その瞬間から、地獄が始まった！

校内にやってきたゾンビの影響か次々と男たちが異形に変わる。

成り行き、クラスメイトの天使マリアと百城モモとチームを組んで、この地獄からの脱出を図る！

altTitles.ja: 白聖女と黒牧師

altTitles.vi: Thánh Nữ Cecilia và Mục Sư Lawrence

description.en:
What’s a priest to do when the Saint he’s tasked to take care of is…a  klutz? One thing’s for sure…every day is bound to be lively!

Saint Cecilia is beloved by the townspeople — not only is she elegant and composed, she benevolently shares her wisdom with all who seek it. That is, until the last person has left — at which point she becomes totally hopeless!

Only Pastor Lawrence is keeping the Saint put together enough to do her duties… and though she may test him, it’s all in a day’s work!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10178/episode/324516) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2256-saint-cecilia-and-pastor-lawrence-1-4)
description.vi: Thánh nữ Cecilia có một bí mật - đó là cô sống hoàn toàn phụ thuộc vào Lawrence, mục sư của nhà thờ. Ngoài ra cô còn có một tình cảm bí mật đối với Lawrence, nói bí mật cho oai thế thôi chứ ai cũng biết riêng chỉ có Lawrence là không biết thôi

altTitles.ja: レッド

description.en:
Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)
description.pt-br: Situado na América do século 19, Red é o último sobrevivente vivo de uma tribo nativa americana que foi massacrada por homens brancos. Em uma longa jornada em busca de vingança, ele viaja com Iero Ito, um samurai que fugiu para a América após ser derrotado na guerra civil de Seinan, e Angie, uma misteriosa prostituta. Os laços de amizade entre os três são comoventes. Embora seja tudo ficção, a história parece muito real, pois é baseada em batalhas reais entre tropas americanas, apaches e outras tribos.

title.en: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!

altTitles.en: Technique is Everything to Yumizuka Iroha!
The Process is Important for Iroha Yumizuka
Yumizuka Iroha's No Good Without Her Procedure!

altTitles.ja: 弓塚いろはは手順が大事！

altTitles.zh: 弓塚同学今天也依旧脱靶

description.en: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!

title.en: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to

altTitles.vi: Sau giờ học, tại nhà hàng gia đình, cùng cô bạn cùng lớp

description.en:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...

altTitles.ja: 殺し愛

altTitles.th: โคโรชิ ไอ

description.en: One day, Chateau, a bounty hunter belonging to an assassin organization, encounters the mysterious bounty hunter Ryang-ha. After being shown the overwhelming difference in their abilities and thinking that this is going to be her end, Ryang-ha's only demand from her is to exchange their contact information. And thus started a game of cat and mouse, in which the hands of the participants are fully covered in blood...
description.fr: Un jour, Château, chasseuse de prime pour une petite société, rencontre le mystérieux assassin Ryang-ha. Après qu’il lui ait montré leurs différences de capacités au combat, Château pense que c’est la fin, mais Ryang-ha lui demande juste d’échanger leurs adresses. Ainsi commence le jeu du chat et de la souris, dont les participants finiront les mains couvertes de sang…
description.it: Quando l'esperta cacciatrice di taglie Chateau si scontra con il misterioso Ryang-ha, anche lui cacciatore di taglie, la donna sembra avere la peggio. L'uomo, però, pare aver sviluppato per lei un certo interesse durante lo scontro: l'unica condizione per lasciare andare Chateau è che lei gli dia il suo numero di telefono. Ha inizio così un pericoloso gioco al gatto e al topo… un gioco dove entrambi i partecipanti hanno le mani sporche di sangue.
description.vi:
Hai chap cuối cùng sẽ chỉ đăng trên nhóm riêng tư Thế giới nhỏ Koroshi Ai cho đến khi web chính thức công khai chap cuối!

Chateau Dankworth, một nữ thợ săn tiền thưởng, thuộc về một tổ chức giết người. Cho rồi đến một ngày, cô gặp được Song Ryangha một thợ săn tiền thưởng bí ẩn. Tưởng như cô sẽ bị mất đi công việc của mình vì sự chênh lệch áp đảo về tài năng, nhưng rồi Ryangha lại yêu cầu một trao đổi. Từ đó về sau, những ngày ăn bám của Ryangha bắt đầu..

Truyện được Việt hóa bởi Spring Blossoms Team!

//Bộ truyện sẽ được beta lại cho đẹp dần//

altTitles.ja: 悪霊 シュトヘル

description.en:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
description.pt-br: Um Jovem chamado Sudou desperta em uma de suas vidas passadas onde ele era uma guerreira Xia chamada Shut Hell a maligna, temida até pelos Mongóis de Genghis Khan que estão unindo forças para acabar com a dinastia Xia Ocidental. a história ocorre no Século 13 onde a Maligna junto com a principe Yurul se esforçam para preservar Xia e sua cultura e escritas.

description.en:
Every 50 years, a battle royale between multiple clans commences in order to achieve the head title "Family Guy" and become the ruling head of all the sorcerer clans. Each clan chooses their own specific representative of their clans, each gambling his or her own life for the title. The only difference is compared to the previous wars, the battlefield takes place within Quahog City, the ground zero for the Ghetto Rays incident.

Bloodedge the Griffin, and agent of Shinra, a special unit directly affiliated with the government and created to deal with supernatural phenomena, monsters, and such is tasked to investigated the Ghetto Rays infested area not knowing of the violent war that is about to approach him.

altTitles.th: โตเกียวกูล-เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 東京喰種 －トーキョーグール－

description.en:
Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
description.ru:
Раса гулей существует с незапамятных времен. Ее представители вовсе не против людей, они их даже любят - преимущественно в сыром виде. Любители человечины внешне неотличимы от нас, сильны, быстры и живучи - но их мало, потому гули выработали строгие правила охоты и маскировки, а нарушителей наказывают сами или по-тихому сдают борцам с нечистью. В век науки люди знают про гулей, но как говорится, привыкли. Власти не считают людоедов угрозой, более того, рассматривают их как идеальную основу для создания суперсолдат. Эксперименты идут уже давно…  
  
Ничего этого не ведал Канэки Кэн, робкий и невзрачный токийский первокурсник, безнадежно влюбленный в красавицу-интеллектуалку Ризэ, частую гостью в кафе «Место встречи», где парень подрабатывает официантом. Не думал Кэн, что скоро самому придется стать гулем, и многие знакомые предстанут в неожиданном свете. Главному герою предстоит мучительный поиск нового пути, ибо он понял, что люди и гули похожи: просто одни друг друга жрут в прямом смысле, другие - в переносном. Правда жизни жестока, переделать ее нельзя, и силен тот, кто не отворачивается. А дальше уж как-нибудь!
description.pt-br: Em Tokyo, criaturas conhecidas como "Ghouls" vivem entre os humanos e os devoram para sobreviver. Alheio a eles, o jovem universitário Ken Kaneki leva uma vida pacata entre livros, até que um trágico encontro o coloca diante desses seres e o obriga a lutar por sua humanidade.

description.en:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

altTitles.ja: かみながしじま ～輪廻の巫女～

description.en: Survive, Girls---!! High-school student Amane Miko is a famous miko in her hometown. One day, she gets involved in a strange traffic accident and finds herself waking up in a world filled with grotesque looking monsters roaming around...!! The constant fear of those monsters attacking!! However, to solve the mysteries of this world, Miko advances through this world of despair. Cooperating with the other surviving girls to escape this solitary island in the distant sea in this Panic Horror Action!
description.ru: Старшеклассница Аманэ Мико - известная Мико в своем родном городе. Однажды она попадает в странное дорожно-транспортное происшествие и обнаруживает, что просыпается в мире, наполненном гротескно выглядящими монстрами, бродящими вокруг...! Постоянный страх нападения этих монстров! Однако, чтобы разгадать тайны этого мира, Мико продвигается сквозь этот мир отчаяния. Сотрудничая с другими выжившими девушками, чтобы сбежать с этого уединенного острова в далеком море в этом паническом хорроре!

description.en:
Rin Ishikawa, 16 years old, the "talent'' that will revolutionize the boxing world has begun to awaken in the north.

Rin is a very popular and mischievous person. He was raised by his mother and grandparents in a small town in Hokkaido.

Now, he has dropped out of high school and is about to embark on his journey.
Without thiniking about his future, he decide to go to Tokyo. 

Rin, little did he know that he would leave his name in the history of boxing.

altTitles.ja: コーヒームーン

description.en: The light is gone. Unable to escape the darkness, Pieta repeats the same day. Every day she walks to school down the same road, through the same rain, then has the same conversation with her friend Danae. Eventually, she finds happiness in the repetition. The days carry on as normal, until one day, her routine chat with Danae takes a different turn: "What?! You can remember the today that happened yesterday too?" Despite their bleak situation, the girls reach towards tomorrow!

Jin Daim, who was being bullied by delinquents, encounters a game on his old phone that changes his life. A fraudulent strategic RPG game where you can boss around the delinquents and recruit benevolent helpers to grow stronger! The ultimate goal of this RPG game is to eliminate school violence from the world.

altTitles.ja: かけおちガール

description.en: Back in high school, Maki and Midori were in love, until graduation came and the two of them went their seperate ways. However, ten years later, Maki has a chance reunion with Midori - and finds that while her feelings haven't changed, Midori has.

altTitles.ja: こっち向いてグレア

description.en:
While going home from his part-time job, Zen, a normal guy, suddenly got transported in the middle of the street of an unknown world. He met a silver-haired man who hides his eyes and learned that he's now in a parallel universe. Zen is a simple man - he doesn't really get what's happening but there's something called 'Dom' and 'Sub' and he's entranced by the man's glare.
Now he can't get enough of his commands.

After the war between Lamrock and Dublin ended, an era of peace began—though it wasn’t the most peaceful kind. In the remote village of Casnier in Lamrock, lived Layla, a simple country girl, and her hard-of-hearing father, Bendo. One day, the quiet village stirred with the arrival of unfamiliar soldiers.

RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.
RENAISSANCE, LIFE, DEATH, ASTRAL DISINTEGRATION.

All beings in the firmament live locked in this infinite cycle. Or so it was until the day they came down from the heavens.

Humanity ceased to be human. Death is no longer the end. Enlightenment came to save her children and defeat the most powerful feeling that consciousness had been able to create.

___

SpaceDrum shows us a society that has evolved to a state of full well-being, freed from wars and conflicts, in search of Nirvana, thanks to the spiritual guidance of an alien race.
The aryas are an elite group charged with the external security of the planet and the protection of the high priestess.

They are chosen because, thanks to their control over their Virya, they are able to control mysterious fragments, the shards. Reda is a student at one of the most distinctive military academies, but he has difficulty controlling his special shard due to constant visions of a strange young woman. And this will not be the biggest of your problems...

title.en: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword

altTitles.en: The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius

altTitles.ru: От нерадивого аристократа до усердного гения

altTitles.ja: 怠惰公子、努力の天才になる

description.en:
After witnessing the shocking death of his mother, young Airen Farreira uses sleep to escape his painful reality, earning him the nickname, “the lazy lord”. Yet, in spite of others’ jeers and whispers, Airen has no intention of changing his ways.

But when he awakens one day from a dream about a mysterious swordsman, his life’s trajectory takes a complete turn...

---
- [Alternative English Translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lazy-lord-masters-the-sword)
description.fr: Irene Perreira est un garçon qui dort pour s’enfuir de la réalité. Les gens se moquent de lui, en l’appelant 'bon à rien' , mais il n'a aucune envie de changer. Jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, il rêva d'un épéiste... C'était un rêve d'un homme sans talent qui a entraîné ses mouvements à l'épée pendant des décennies.
description.ja: 誰も期待していなかった一族の怠け者、アイルーンパレイラがついに剣を手に取る。
description.ko:
잠을 도피처로 삼아 온 소년 아이른 파레이라.
사람들은 그를 나태 공자라 부르며 조롱했지만 그는 변할 생각이 없었다.
어느 날 어느 검사의 꿈을 꾸기 전까지는...
그것은 그저 묵묵히 수십 년간 검을 휘두르며 단련하는 한 재능 없는 사내에 관한 꿈이었다.
description.ru:
Юный Айрон Парейра сделал свой мир грёз убежищем от боли трагедии прошлого. Людей забавляло это, они подняли его на смех и прозвали нерадивым аристократом. Однако подобное отношение никак не задевало нашего героя необходимостью меняться.
Так бы всё и продолжалось, не повстречай он во сне бездарного юношу, который тридцать семь лет подряд обучался владению мечом, да так и умер с оружием в руках.
description.zh-hk: 家族中的懶惰蟲終於拿起了劍！將睡覺視為逃避方法的少年艾倫．帕雷拉，即使人們都嘲笑他為懶惰公子，他依然不願改變，直到有天他夢見了一位數十年間不斷揮劍鍛練的無才男子...

altTitles.en: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest

altTitles.th: อาชีพกระจอกแล้วทำไม ยังไงข้าก็เทพ

altTitles.ja: ありふれた職業で世界最強

altTitles.zh: 平凡职业成就世界最强

altTitles.es-la: El más fuerte del mundo en una profesión mundana

altTitles.vi: Arifureta - Từ tầm thường đến bất khả chiến bại

altTitles.de: Arifureta - Der Kampf zurück in meine Welt

description.en:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.fr:
Le quotidien de l’étudiant ordinaire qu’est Hajime Nagumo, dont la vie ne se comporte que de nuits blanches et siestes en cours, se retrouve bouleversé lorsque sa classe et lui se retrouvent transportés en tant qu’héros dans un autre monde afin de le sauver… Alors que tout le monde obtient des jobs assez puissants, notre héros se retrouve avec le job « Synergiste », assez inutile en l’état des choses, humilié et jeté seul dans les tréfonds d’un donjon, arrivera-t-il à survivre ?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.it:
Tra gli studenti trasportati in un altro mondo, Nagumo Hajime è uno studente senza ambizioni ed aspirazioni nella vita, è infatti soprannominato l’Incapace dai suoi compagni.
Gli studenti sono stati evocati per ergersi ad eroi e salvare il paese dalla distruzione. A loro sono stati donati poteri e classi di livello, a tutti tranne che a Nagumo Hajime, che inizia da Sinergista con statistiche mediocri.
Il Sinergista, è in altre parole un “crafter”. Essendo il più debole, finisce per cadere nelle profondità di un abisso durante l'esplorazione di un sotterraneo. 
Cosa troverà nelle profondità dell’abisso... e riuscirà a sopravvivere?
description.pl:
Wśród uczniów klasy przeniesionej do innego świata, Hajime Nagumo niczym się nie wyróżnia; ot najzwyklejszy w świecie uczeń niemający ambicji czy życiowego celu, dlatego też nazywany w klasie "Nieudacznikiem".
Gdy cała klasa trafiła do innego świata, by zostać bohaterami i ocalić cały kraj przed zniszczeniem, wszyscy zostali pobłogosławieni oszukańczymi statystykami i świetnymi profesjami… za wyjątkiem Hajime, który skończył z profesją "Synergetyka" i przeciętnymi statystykami. "Synergetyk", ujmując to inaczej, jest zwyczajną klasą rzemieślniczą. Będąc najsłabszym w klasie, spada w głąb otchłani podczas wspólnego eksplorowania lochu. Czego dowiedział się w jej czeluściach i czy uda mu się przetrwać?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.ru:
Хадзимэ Нагумо, живущий по принципу «Первым делом - хобби», и весь его класс вдруг призывают в другой мир. Одноклассники один за другим открывают невероятные по меркам этого мира способности, ну а Хадзимэ достается бесполезный ремесленный класс «Синергист». Оказавшись в самых глубинах преисподней, он находит применения своему заурядному таланту и стремится найти выход из лабиринта…  


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
description.es-la:
Entre la clase transportada a otro mundo, Nagumo Hajime es un estudiante normal y corriente que no tiene ambiciones ni aspiraciones en la vida, por lo que sus compañeros le llaman "Incompetente".
La clase fue convocada para convertirse en héroes y salvar a un país de la destrucción. Los estudiantes de la clase fueron bendecidos con habilidades tramposas y una categoría de trabajo genial, sin embargo, no fue el caso de Hajime, con su profesión de "Sinergista", y sus estadísticas muy mediocres. "Sinergista", para decirlo en otra palabra era simplemente la clase artesanal. Siendo el más débil, entonces cae a la profundidad del abismo cuando él y sus compañeros estaban explorando una mazmorra. ¿Qué encontró en la profundidad del abismo, y podrá sobrevivir?
description.pt-br: Entre a turma transportada para outro mundo, Nagumo Hajime é um estudante do sexo masculino comum que não tem ambição nem aspiração na vida, e, portanto, chamado de " incompetente" por seus colegas. A classe foi convocada para se tornar heróis e salvar um país da destruição. Os alunos da classe foram abençoados com as especificações de trapaça e classes legais, no entanto, não foi o caso com Hajime , com a sua profissão como um " Synergist " , e suas estatísticas muito medíocres. "Synergist", para colocá-lo em outras palavrsa era apenas a classe dos artesãos. Sendo o mais fraco , então ele cai para a profundidade do abismo , quando ele e seus colegas estavam explorando uma dungeon. O que ele encontra na profundidade do abismo, e ele pode sobreviver?

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

title.en: Kyouran Reijou Nia Liston - Byoujaku Reijou ni Tensei shita Kamigoroshi no Bujin no Karei Naru Musouroku

altTitles.ja: 凶乱令嬢ニア・リストン 病弱令嬢に転生した神殺しの武人の華麗なる無双録

altTitles.en: Brutal Daughter Nia Liston: A Splendid Matchless Record of a God-Slaying Warrior Reincarnated as a Sickly Daughter

altTitles.vi: Cuồng loạn lệnh nương - Nia Liston

description.en:
The strongest reincarnated daughter goes on the rampage! A gripping, otherworldly entertainment!

"I wanted to die fighting anyway."

The great hero, who once even killed a god, wanted to fight even in death. What awaited her was her reincarnation as a sickly noblewoman. In the future world, she becomes the beautiful but too weak Daughter Nia Liston, but in her second life, she goes on a rampage in battle, in delivery activities and in academy life!

This is a record of the brilliant battles of the hero who will eventually be known as the "Wicked Rampant Daughter". The most powerful Warriors' Daughter presents the start of a painful otherworldly entertainment!

title.en: Seishiki Ni Majo Ni Natta Nidome No Akuyaku Koujo Wa, Mou Nido To Taisetsu Na Mono Wo Ushinawanaito Kokoro Ni Chikau

altTitles.ja: 正式に魔女になった二度目の悪役皇女は、もう二度と大切な者を失わないと心に誓う

description.en:
Princess Alice, who was turned back to her 10 year old self with the “witch’s power” before she died, meets Theodore, a heretic (Nox).
He is the most hated and shunned member of the Knights’ Order, but for a girl who was killed because of her crimson hair, he is the only person who can share her loneliness!
However, contrary to the rumors (of the past), she is intelligent and gets caught up in a battle over the right to inherit the throne…?
”Would you like to become a witch’s knight out of self-interest?”
“That’s a ridiculous invitation, I don’t think you’re a princess, is it?”

A relife story of a figurehead princess and a lonely knight who finally meet, both of whom have “crimson”!
description.ja:
死に際に“魔女の能力”で十歳に戻った皇女・アリスが出会ったのは、異端の民(ノクス)・セオドア。
騎士団一の嫌われ者で忌避される紅を持つ彼だが、紅髪ゆえに殺された少女にとっては孤独を分かち合える唯一の相手だった!
だが、噂(かつて)と違って聡明な彼女は、王位継承権を巡る争いへ巻き込まれていきーー?
「打算で魔女の騎士になりませんか?」「皇女とも思えねぇ、とんだ誘い文句だな?」
ようやく出会えた、ともに“紅”を持つお飾りの皇女と孤独な騎士のリライフストーリー!

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロインが多すぎる！@comic
マケイン

altTitles.th: รักครั้งนี้มีคนนกเยอะไปมั้ย?!

altTitles.vi: Có Quá Nhiều Nữ Chính Thua Cuộc! @comic

description.en:
***“Huh? Who are you calling losing?”***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_“Even though he said we’ll get married. Don’t you think he’s pretty mean?”
“When did he say that?”
“When we were 4 or 5 years old.”_

That doesn’t count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_“Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats.”
“I see. Well, that’s a bold statement.”_

There’s a fortune for those who shine only after losing. Losing Heroines—The curtain to the mysterious coming-of-age story “Makeine” opens now!
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official LN (JP)](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
- [Alternative Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
description.ja:
クラスの背景モブ高校生こと温水和彦は、男子に人気のクラスメート・八奈見杏菜が幼馴染にフラれるのを目撃してしまう。
仕方なく八奈見を慰める温水だが、それをきっかけに、様々な負け感あふれる女子たちに絡まれることになり――!?
負けヒロイン――マケインたちと辿る謎の青春が、ここに幕を開ける！
負けてこそ輝く彼女たちに、幸いあれ。
description.vi:
“Hử? Cậu gọi ai là đồ thua cuộc cơ?”

Tôi, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, một nhân vật làm nền trong lớp, chứng kiến cảnh cô nàng nổi tiếng – Anna Yanami bị một nam sinh khác từ chối.

“Dù cho cậu ấy đã từng nói bọn mình sẽ kết hôn đấy. Cậu có thấy cậu ấy quá đáng không?”

“Cậu ấy nói thế vào lúc nào vậy?”

“Hồi bọn tớ 4 hay 5 tuổi gì đó.”

Thế thì đâu có tính?

Cùng với cô nàng còn có những nữ chính thua cuộc khác như Remon Yakishio của Câu lạc bộ Điền kinh và Komari Chika từ Câu lạc bộ Văn học.

“Nukumizu-kun nè, trên đời có hai loại con gái. Một là bạn thuở nhỏ, còn lại là đồ đàn bà giựt bồ.”

“Vậy hả. Chà, một tuyên bố đầy táo bạo ha.”

Có một loại vận mệnh rằng có những người chỉ thực sự toả sáng sau khi đã thua cuộc.

Những nữ chính thua cuộc—Bức màn câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn mang tên “Makein” sẽ lật mở ngay bây giờ!
description.es-la: "¿Eh? ¿A quién llamas perdedor?" Como fondo de la clase, yo, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, fui testigo de cómo una chica popular -Anna Yanami- era rechazada por otro chico. "Aunque dijo que nos casaríamos. ¿No crees que es bastante malo?" "¿Cuándo dijo eso?" "Cuando teníamos 4 o 5 años". Eso no cuenta, ¿verdad? Con esto, las heroínas perdedoras como Remon Yakishio del Club de Atletismo, y Chika Komari, del club de literatura. "Nukumizu-kun. Hay dos tipos de chicas. Las amigas de la infancia o las gatas tramposas". "Ya veo. Bueno, esa es una declaración audaz". Hay una fortuna para los que brillan sólo después de perder. ¡Heroínas perdedoras-El telón de la misteriosa historia de madurez "Makeine" se abre ahora! ["Makeine" es la abreviación del nombre del manga]
description.pt-br: O simples, chato e sem amigos Nukumizu Kazuhiko testemunhou algo completamente desconcertante: a garota popular Yanami Anna foi colocada na friend zone por seu crush e amigo de infância! Na verdade, todas as garotas populares ao redor dele estão sendo rejeitadas da mesma forma pelos garotos de quem gostam. Sem perceber, Kazuhiko se envolve no drama do relacionamento onde todas as heroínas principais estão perdendo o amor! Ele pode manter o ânimo delas e ajudá-las a encontrar a felicidade?

altTitles.ja: はりあう妻と犬

description.en: A story about a wife who loves her husband and her dog fighting over his love.
description.ja: 夫大好きな妻と犬が夫の愛を奪い合う話.

title.en: Mitsume no Onna no Ko ni Kokuhaku Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 三つ目の女の子に告白する話

altTitles.en: A Story About Confesing your Love to a Girl with Three Eyes

altTitles.ja: 新テニスの王子様

description.en: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facility—including 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.

title.en: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru

altTitles.ja: 鬼売れアイドルが今日も私を推してくる

altTitles.en: The Superstar Idol Crushes on Me Today Too

description.en:
Unpopular underground idol and actress, Enatsu Sayuki, faces her work diligently everyday to achieve her dreams of making it big in the world of acting. But, for some reason, the superstar idol Touma Sera – who should be her rival – becomes her biggest fan!

Adorable enough to make Sayuki jealous, Sera takes every chance to passionately declare her love, throwing Sayuki’s life into chaos.

Will Sayuki be able to achieve her dreams? And what will become of the one-sided love(?) between Sera and Sayuki...!?


The curtain rises on the clash between these young talents in the fierce age of idol showbiz. Let the show begin!
description.ja:
売れない地下アイドル兼俳優の江夏紗雪は、演技の世界で大成する夢を叶えるため、日々地道に目の前の仕事に向き合っていた。
……が、ライバルであるはずの鬼売れアイドル・冬麻seraが、なぜかしつこく紗雪を推してくる!!
嫉妬するほどかわいいseraの熱烈すぎるラブコールに紗雪は振り回されっぱなし！
果たして、紗雪は夢を叶えることができるのか？
そして、一方通行にも見えるseraと紗雪の恋（？）の行方は…!?
アイドル戦国時代の芸能界を舞台に繰り広げられる若き才能のぶつかり合い、開幕!!

title.en: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 推しの美少女に告白される話

altTitles.en: I was Confessed to by my Beautiful Oshi

description.en: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.
description.ja: 推しの美少女に告白されて恋人になるラブコメ百合漫画です。
description.pt-br: Um romcom yuri onde uma estrela se confessa e vira uma namorada.

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.fr: Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime

altTitles.en: In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

altTitles.de: Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: The Three Skills I Received, When Combined, Were The Most Powerful

altTitles.ja: 貰った三つの外れスキル、合わせたら最強でした

altTitles.ja-ro: Moratta Mittsu no Hazure Skill, Awasetara Saikyō Deshita

altTitles.en: Moratta Mittsu no Hazure Skill, Awasetara Saikyou Deshita

description.en:
Mutou Kushina's life, filled with brutality, came to an abrupt end. In his new incarnation, the goddess granted him three abilities: [Super Speedy Regeneration], [Agelessness], and [Grit: Indomitable Spirit].

However, those skills were outlier skills that were not offensive skills!

The place where he was reborn with such skills is the Forest of Endless Calamity, where a large number of Danger Level S monsters roam, one of which is capable of destroying the world.

Having no offensive skills, Kushina's  should have been killed by the monsters right away, but...?

With all three skills, he can instantly regenerate no matter what kind of attack he receives! And every time he is attacked, he gets stronger and stronger...
description.ja:
壮絶な前世の末、命を落とした少年・無倒屈止無（むとう くしな）。

転生する際に女神に貰ったのは【超速再生】【不老】【根性：不撓不屈】という３つのスキル。しかし、それらのスキルは攻撃系のスキルではない外れスキルだった！

そんなスキルを持って転生した先は、“危険度S”の1匹で世界を滅ぼせる程のモンスターが大量に闊歩している【果ての災厄の森】。

攻撃系のスキルを持たない屈止無はすぐにモンスターに殺されるはずだったが……？

３つのスキルを組み合わせたらどんな攻撃を受けても瞬時に再生！しかも攻撃される度に強くなっていき―

altTitles.ja: ニャンて男

description.en:
What if your dream date turns out to be a…cat? Such is the dilemma for Bonnie, a young woman who wanted love and ended up with Claude, a highly needy half-man-half-cat instead. Will they be able to make it work? Is sharing the litterbox going to be a huge problem? And what ARE her friends going to think? Read Meow Man to see how this big ball of yarn unfurls.  
  
  
Que feriez-vous si vous vous réveillez face à une personne mi-homme mi-chat ? Tel est la situation dans laquelle se trouve Bonnie…

altTitles.ja: 君のラブを見せてくれ！

altTitles.zh-ro: Xiàng wǒ zhǎnlù nǐ de ài

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.en: Return with the Power of the King

description.en: In a world where one's worth is determined by how powerful their skill is, Taehyeon is 35, unawakened, and barely able to scrape by as a pack bearer for monster hunters. But when a mysterious being calling itself “the King” gives him a skill of his own, Taehyeon gets a second chance at life. Now he’s back in high school and armed with Gluttony, a skill that allows him to block and absorb the skills of others!

altTitles.ja: 恋人以上友人未満

altTitles.en: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends

altTitles.pt-br: Mais Que Amantes, Menos Que Amigos

altTitles.ru: Больше чем любовники, меньше чем друзья

description.en: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
description.ja: 東京から地元へ戻った宮子のお見合い相手は互いの秘密を握る元お仕事相手だった！　清楚な文学少女を演じていた元AV女優とオラオラ系男を演じていた元AV男優が素の自分に戻って再会した時、この上もなくピュアなラブが始まる…！カラダは恋人以上、ココロは友人未満!?
description.ru: Мияко, уволившаяся с работы и вернувшаяся в родительский дом, затеяла сватовство. Однако второй стороной оказался бывший коллега, знавший разные секреты.
description.pt-br:
A ex-estrela de AV(Adult Videos) Miyako inesperadamente encontra um ex-colega de trabalho em uma entrevista de casamento...?! O par secretamente conectado está repleto de energia mais pura do que você pode imaginar! 

Esta comédia de amor adulto é diferente e vai curar sua alma.

altTitles.ja: Magic of Stella
ステラのまほう

description.en: Upon enrolling in high school, Tamaki Honda joins a club for making doujin games known as the SNS Club. Joined by programmer Shiina, writer Ayame, and composer Kayo, Tamaki begins working as an illustrator for the club's next game.

I see what Angels see and do what Demons do. Those are the words a psychopath named Dennis saw when he found "The Channeler"... A powerful artifact that two massive evil corporations (Ravenfort) and (Blue Hand)will stop at nothing to get it back. at the same time Dennis Trauma haunts his day and night, while his adopted brother is still suffering from the loss of his wife ten years ago to a mysterious disease. #thriller_mystery
#mystery #thriller

altTitles.ja: ひめちゃんは重い女

description.en:
Himeno is a college sophomore who's into other women.
Although she is happy being madly in love with her wonderful girlfriend, Yoru, she is often filled with worries and anxieties because of it...
This is the story of her everyday life.
